summary: Implements a Graph Convolutional Network model for MXNet using DGL's GraphConv layer, initializing two graph convolution stages and a forward routine that applies dropout, activation, and successive graph convolutions to propagate node features across the graph structure.
business_intent: Offers a ready-to-use example of a semi‑supervised graph neural network that can be trained and evaluated on node classification tasks, helping developers and researchers quickly adopt GCN techniques within MXNet‑based pipelines.
